Key Match Events: The Suns came back and won the game in overtime, 116-113.
The final shot that forced overtime was pure Kevin Durant brilliance.
Post-Match Reflections: Hopefully, last night served as a learning experience for Budenholzer.
As a Suns fan, I’ve seen this story play out before, and I’m not keen on reading it again.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns were falling back on familiar patterns despite new additions.
James Jones smartly went and acquired to quality facilitators while simultaneously signing two players who possess ball security.
Others: The Suns lacked a true point guard in the traditional sense last season.
Kevin Durant led the team with a 29.5 usage percentage in the Suns' win on Wednesday.
